==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=观}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|雚|見|c1=p|c2=s|t2=see|ls=psc}}.

===Etymology===
“To watch; to observe” (Pronunciation 1) > “watchtower; platform; temple” (Pronunciation 2).

{{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} connects it with {{och-l|侯|target}} and {{och-l|候|to watch; to be on the lookout for; to wait}}.
